CREATE TABLE PatientTests (
    patient_id INT,
    test_date DATE,
    test_name VARCHAR(50),
    test_result FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY(patient_id, test_date)
);


CREATE TABLE TrendAnalysis (
    trend_id SERIAL,
    patient_id INT,
    trend_date DATE,
    trend_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY(trend_id),
    FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES PatientTests(patient_id)
);

)

)

)
